description.value: Profile on the Composition resource which represents the Aanmeldbericht for eOverdracht conform information standard ['Verpleegkundige zorg'](https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/Landingspagina_Verpleegkundige_Zorg)

purpose.value: The purpose of an Aanmeldbericht is to enable the health organization that receives it to assess the patient/client's care demands and accept or reject the application.

short.value: Who or what initiated the Aanmeldbericht

definition.value: The person that initiated the sending of the Aanmeldbericht. Alternatively, this may be the sending XIS.
Section for administrative data, including date of transfer, contact person and payer details, and details of the sending and receiving organizations.
Captures the planned transfer date, which can change in the actual transfer phase.
Subsection listing personal data of the payer and contact persons that are legal representatives of the patient.
Subsection listing data about the sending organization.

short.value: A reference to data about the sending organization

definition.value: Subsection listing data about the receiving organization.

short.value: A reference to data about the receiving organization

definition.value: Section for medical context, such as diagnosis, medical history and alerts.
Subsection listing data concerning the medical diagnosis.

short.value: A reference to data concerning the medical diagnosis
A reference to data concerning medical history
A reference to data concerning medical history

definition.value: Subsection listing relevant freedom restricting measures.

short.value: A reference to data concerning freedom restricting measures

comment.value: Nictiz terminology centre hasn't found a proper code for Needs and Preferences, to differentiate on this matter, we use title instead.

definition.value: Section for specifying current health situation regarding existing medical aids that are of interest in the nursing context.
This subsection contains information about the patient's infusions and/or feeding tube systems.

short.value: A reference to data about the patient's feeding tube systems
A reference to data about the patient's infusions

definition.value: This subsection contains information about the patient's stomata.
